question: Who has become the 1st person to be put on the "National No Fly List"?
explanation: Birju Salla, who created a hijack scare onboard a Jet Airways flight in 2017, has become the 1st person to be put on the "National No Fly List". He has been banned from flying under highest level of onboard unruly behaviour that entails grounding from 2 years to lifetime. A person put on the no-fly list can't fly by any flight of that airline, international or domestic, for grounded period.
